lead_paragraph: Russia will not sign a transfer agreement with the National Hockey League just weeks after ratifying the deal, the country’s ice hockey chief said yesterday. Vladislav Tretiak, president of the Russian Ice Hockey Federation, said the proposed agreement was not in the best interest of Russian clubs.
